Pre-Game Insights: Lionel Messi is poised to make his first international appearance of 2024.
Scaloni could give some fringe players the chance to impress.
Lisandro Martinez may be given valuable game time after returning from injury.
Roma's Leandro Paredes may get a rare starting opportunity.
Alejandro Garnacho is hoping to make his first appearance since scoring in Man United's FA Cup triumph at Wembley.
The match is part of Argentina's preparation for the upcoming Copa America in the USA.
